monitors.name: Cloudflare
monitors.description: Get an email every time a certificate is issued for one of your monitored domains.

monitors.name: Facebook
monitors.description: Get a Facebook notification or Webhook callback every time a certificate is issued for one of your monitored domains.

monitors.name: Graham Edgecombe
monitors.description: Monitor that includes a list of all known logs with latest timestamp, status and uptime.

monitors.name: Google
monitors.description: Search for a domain to see all associated certificates and the logs they’ve been added to.

monitors.name: SSLMate
monitors.description: Monitor domains for expiring and unauthorized SSL certificates and get notified if there’s a problem.
